channel.title: Need help with this command!

item.title: Need help with this command!
item.dc:creator: @pkforlol3 pkforlol3
item.description:
@pkforlol3 wrote:

well, i got this now:

Code:
if (command.startsWith(“membership”) && playerRights >= 3) {
String member = command.substring(11);
sendMessage(“Player “+member+” has become a Member!”);

for (int a = 1; a < PlayerHandler.maxPlayers; a++) {
if (PlayerHandler.players[a] != null) {
if(PlayerHandler.players[a].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(member)){
PlayerHandler.players[a].playerIsMember = 2;
}
}
}
}
i want the:

Code:
PlayerHandler.players[a].playerIsMember = 2;

to lead to my char file PlayerRights, i want the playerismember = 2; be playerrights = 4,

how do i do this??

Read full topic
